# notificationCenter()

**Type Method**

Creates a vibrancy effect for use in Notification Center.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func notificationCenter() -> UIVibrancyEffect
```

## Return Value

The vibrancy effect that’s appropriate for use in Today widgets in Notification Center. To learn more about Today widgets, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Conceptual/ExtensibilityPG/Today.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40014214-CH11].

## Deprecated

- **widgetPrimary()**: Creates a vibrancy effect suitable for use with certain supporting text and template images within a widget.
- **widgetSecondary()**: Creates a vibrancy effect suitable for indicating the secondary importance or relevance of supporting text and template images within a widget.
- **widgetEffect(forVibrancyStyle:)**: Creates a vibrancy effect for the specified style.
